desc: Finds the searched boss, and gives you a list of items it drops and their droprate

usage: -changelog <version number and letter> or by itself will give you the latest version
desc: Displays the changelog in a direct message (since message can be very long)
Gives a link to donate to the map developer!
Lists all commands or info about a specific command.
Gives you the invite link to TWRPG-BOT

usage: -list <category> to search by name and type simultaneously OR can search it individually by adding the category to the end of the command: -listtype, -listname
desc: PMs the user with a list of items nearest to the word typed in. It can search by categories: name and type
Shows you details about an item, such as recipe, stats, droprate, etc.

usage: -roll <from> <to> or nothing to roll the default 1-200

desc: Shows you the size of how many items, characters, and bosses are recorded on this bot

usage: -skill <hero name> or -skill <skill name> or -skill <hero name> all
desc: Shows the details of a skill name specified, or lists the skill names of a specified class. Can also be used to view all hero skills at the same time by adding the key word "all" at the end. (See the usage)
aliases: abil, skills, spell, spells, hero, heros, heroes

desc: shows a list of spec items for the specified hero
